title: China offers 'no apology' in first meeting after spy balloon incident, Blinken says
description: China's senior foreign minister offered “no apology” in his meeting with Secretary of State Antony Blinken for the spy balloon that floated over the U.S.

title: U.S. officials believe China may be providing Russia non-lethal military assistance in Ukraine war
description: The U.S. believes China may be providing non-lethal military assistance to Russia for use in Ukraine, according to four US officials, and the administration is concerned they are considering sending lethal aid.

title: Russia has committed 'crimes against humanity' in Ukraine, Kamala Harris says
description: The U.S. has formally determined that Russia has committed “crimes against humanity” in its war with Ukraine, Vice President Kamala Harris said Saturday, adding that Washington is "troubled that Beijing had deepened its relationship with Moscow" since the invasion.

title: Soccer star found dead and many still missing in Turkey earthquake rubble
description: A soccer star has been found dead under the building where he lived in Turkey, his agent said Saturday.

title: Soccer star found dead and many still missing in Turkey earthquake rubble
description: A soccer star has been found dead under the building where he lived in Turkey, his agent said Saturday.

title: North Korea fires ballistic missile as U.S. and South Korea ready for military drills
description: TOKYO — North Korea fired a long-range ballistic missile from its capital Pyongyang towards the sea, officials in South Korea and Japan said Saturday.

title: A new life, a death and an escape: Three  hours in the line of Russian fire
description: CHASIV YAR, Ukraine — Swaddled in a blanket, Maksym is hours old as his mother is carried out on a makeshift stretcher to a waiting ambulance.
